item.title: Hope
item.description: Yeah Â [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/warriors_of_the_north.md#we-are-the-warriors-of-the-north-vyl-wnanory|Sometimes I feel so wrong]] [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/warriors_of_the_north.md#we-are-the-warriors-of-the-north-vyl-wnanory|Like I’m being held down]] [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/warriors_of_the_north.md#we-are-the-warriors-of-the-north-vyl-wnanory|I feel my heart like a rock, it’s sinking]] [[songs/a/amon_amarth/deceiver_of_the_gods/warriors_of_the_north.
